summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Food System Early Warning & Shock Simulator dashboard. All core functionality working perfectly including dashboard, mandi details, simulation, and alerts views.
passed_tests: All 11 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Dashboard loads with 6 mandi cards correctly
Summary stats show correct counts (Total: 6, High Risk: 2, Watch: 3, Normal: 1)
Mandi cards are clickable and navigate to detail view
Mandi detail view shows price charts, arrivals charts, and diagnostics
Navigation tabs (Dashboard, Simulate, Alerts) work correctly
Simulation panel allows mandi selection, shock type, intensity, and duration
Run simulation button triggers API and shows results with price impact and ripple effect
Simulation results show before/after price projection charts
Alerts view shows high risk and watch mandis correctly
Dark theme with green accents implemented properly
Responsive design works on desktop viewport
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
